Package terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback

Interface Summary
FeedbackTarget This interface serves as a target for feedback state events.
 

Class Summary
ActionManager A manager that oversees action interaction for a group of targets.
ActionTrigger A feedback trigger that monitors various input sensor events and generates a feedback action state event whenever the action state changes relative to none or more pick target objects.
Feedback Provides feedback event constants and utilities.
FeedbackEnableTrigger An enable trigger that monitors feedback events.
FeedbackGroupManager A manager that performs feedback on a group of selected feedback targets by relaying the group feedback state to all selected event targets (the group).
FeedbackManager An abstract base class for managers that manage feedback interaction for a group of targets through feedback triggers.
FeedbackMinion A proxy for a feedback target and trigger managed by a feedback manager.
FeedbackSplitter Splits (multicasts) the source event to multiple event targets.
FeedbackTrigger A feedback trigger base class that tracks the feedback state and selectively passes input and internal feedback events to the event target.
MultiAction A multishape associated with "action" (e.g.
MultiSelect A multishape associated with "selection" (e.g.
MultiShape Base class for switch-like groups implementing the "multishape" technique, where an object is represented as a set of discrete shapes associated with corresponding interactive feedback states.
MultiStatus A multishape associated with "status" (e.g.
SelectManager A manager that oversees select interaction for a group of targets.
SelectTrigger A feedback trigger that monitors various input sensor events and generates a feedback select state event whenever the select state changes.
StatusManager A manager that oversees status interaction for a group of targets.
StatusTrigger A feedback trigger that monitors various input sensor events and generates a feedback status state event whenever the status state changes.
